page.title: 05LEISURE
page.content: I gave questionnaires to 60 children with an age range from 11-15 years.Iwas trying to find out how and where they spent their free time.Here are my results: 9% have been to the cinema recently. 66% have videos at home. 75% watch 4 or more hours of T.V. Only about 4% go to the theatre or the opera. When asked what places they would like to go to if they could;80% said cinema, 70% said disco, and 60% said sports events. 60% of the people surveyed had recently read a book.The most popular books were about every day life or animals.Musical tastes varied and 40% had actually bought a record recently. I think the survey shows that teenagers depend on T.V.for most of their entertainment.It is interesting that so many would like to go to the cinema but very few actually do.BY PAULA MESSAM.
